name: FACT OR WACK
description:
Trivia with a Twist! Fact or Wack is the ultimate time attack trivia game with some surprises thrown in. There are twelve challenging and hilarious levels with tons of questions. Try your best to ace every question on each level while racing against the timer. To pass a level you have to get 100% and beat the timer. Questions range from movies, sports, technology, music, current/past events, and a ton more! If you're fast and smart you just might survive!
Check out FACT OR WACK movies as well!
